constraints.name: binary_tree_structure
constraints.description: 树为完美二叉树，每个非叶节点有两个子节点，且所有叶子节点到根节点的距离相同

constraints.name: preorder_traversal
constraints.description: 计算树的前序遍历字符串

constraints.name: character_set
constraints.description: 每个节点上的字符只能是 A 或 B

constraints.name: operation_limit
constraints.description: 可以对树进行任意次数的操作以改变前序遍历字符串

constraints.name: distinct_strings
constraints.description: 计算不同前序遍历字符串的数量
